items.sentence: Tom said he was kidnapped when he was thirteen.
Tom said he was working on something important.
Tom says that he and Mary are moving to Boston.
Tom says that he just wants to make Mary happy.
Tom told Mary that he wasn\'t going to do that.
Tom told Mary that he\'d help her wash her car.
Tom told Mary that he\'d look into the problem.
It took Tom three hours to finish his homework.
I think it would\'ve been difficult to do that.
Tom walked past Mary without even noticing her.
Tom wanted Mary to tell him that she loved him.
I found it difficult to track down information.
Mary told me that she thought Tom was handsome.
Mary wanted Tom to pretend to be her boyfriend.
Mary will be wearing a blue dress to the dance.
Are you really thinking of buying that old car?
I\'ll ask Tom to carry your suitcases upstairs.
I thought if I left Boston, I could forget you.
Tom didn\'t make enough brownies for everybody.
Tom didn\'t say anything about going to Boston.
